price: Wonhunuu sε wͻdi akͻneaba wͻ bonhwa biara mu, (ka biribiara ho asεm, kamfo deε εyε ne deε εnyε nyinaa wͻ anwensԑm mu?)
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
